hero.name: Khaled Almasri
hero.subtitle: A passionate software developer crafting beautiful web experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate software developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My journey in tech started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet, which led me to pursue a career in software development.
about.description2: I specialize in building responsive and user-friendly web applications, with expertise in both frontend and backend development. I'm constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies to deliver the best solutions.
about.description3: I also have a strong understanding of Artificial Intelligence concepts, including machine learning workflows, data processing, and AI-assisted development. Combined with my hardware and mechatronics background, I bridge the gap between software and physical systems, enabling me to build intelligent, real-world solutions.
about.edu1Desc: Frontend & backend development, APIs, databases, and modern web technologies.
about.edu2Desc: Hardware systems, electronics, automation, troubleshooting, and industrial technology.
about.edu3Title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (Self-Study / Practical Experience)
about.edu3Desc: AI fundamentals, model usage, automation, prompt engineering, and AI-assisted development workflows.
